scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.build:arbitrum: yarn clean && yarn codegen:arbitrum && graph build
scripts.build:avalanche: yarn clean && yarn codegen:avalanche && graph build
scripts.build:optimism: yarn clean && yarn codegen:optimism && graph build
scripts.build:polygon: yarn clean && yarn codegen:polygon && graph build
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: yarn build:arbitrum && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ guillaumenervoxs/angle-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:avalanche: yarn build:avalanche && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ guillaumenervoxs/angle-avalanche
scripts.deploy:optimism: yarn build:optimism && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ guillaumenervoxs/angle-optimism
scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn build:polygon && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ guillaumenervoxs/angle-polygon
scripts.deploy:dev: yarn build && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ picodes/token-dev
scripts.deploy-local: yarn clean && yarn prepare && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 angle/sub
